Hey HighCode, may I ask please what is your opinion of this Blu-ray as far as Picture Quality and such?  I'm not sure if I should keep it as a full BR (if the quality is really sharp) or if I should bring it down to a BD9.

Thanks man!

Picture quality is very poor. I just started encoding it to 1080p, although 720p would be probably the same result. It looks like an average DVD. No user reviews yet on bluray.com because release date was just a week ago, but I'm sure many buyers will be very pissed lol. Keeping the full BD is surely a waste.

snap shots:  http://imgbox.com/g/VzEpgsZY8h
